General.Name: Golden Flower Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Golden Flower Tbk manufactures and sells garments in Indonesia. It offers men's and women's casuals, and formal light woven wears. The company's products include ladies blouse, men's shirts, non-iron shirts, casual shirts, skirts, dresses, night wear, uniforms, etc. It also offers garment services, such as cutting, R and D, washing, sewing, checking, ironing, smoking, faggotting, pleatings, and finishing. The company also exports its products. PT Golden Flower Tbk was founded in 1958 and is based in Semarang, Indonesia. PT Golden Flower Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Profashion Apparel.
